attrs.script:
var = '@@{hosts_stats}@@'
r=json.loads(var)
data=r['data']

# Sort hosts by memory usage
ordered_keys = sorted(data.values(), key=lambda v: (v['mem_usage_bytes']))
print "host_mem_usage=",ordered_keys[0]['mem_usage_bytes']
print "host_uuid=",ordered_keys[0]['uuid']

attrs.script:
source /etc/profile
echo "vm_name="toto
acli vm.create toto num_vcpus=8 memory=32G container=General-1
acli vm.disk_create toto clone_from_image=TEMPLATE-ESXi bus=ide index=0
acli net.create toto-pg vswitch_name=br1 vlan=0
acli vm.nic_create toto model=e1000 network="NestedESXi-DHCP" ip=10.68.98.230
acli vm.nic_create toto model=e1000 network="toto-pg"
acli vm.update toto cpu_passthrough=true
acli vm.on toto

source /etc/profile
echo "ip_addr="$(acli vm.get toto | grep ip_address | awk -F ':' '{print $2}' | tr -d '"')

source /etc/profile
ip='@@{ip_addr}@@'

echo $ip

ssh -i /home/nutanix/.ssh/id_rsa -l root 10.68.98.230 'esxcli network ip interface ipv4 set -i vmk0 -I 10.68.98.230 -N 255.255.255.0 -t static;esxcfg-route 10.68.98.1;reboot'

action_list.description: System action for creating an application

attrs.script:
var = '@@{hosts_stats}@@'
r=json.loads(var)
data=r['data']

# Sort hosts by memory usage
ordered_keys = sorted(data.values(), key=lambda v: (v['mem_usage_bytes']))
print "host_mem_usage=",ordered_keys[0]['mem_usage_bytes']
print "host_uuid=",ordered_keys[0]['uuid']

action_list.name: action_create

echo "vm_name="toto
